title: Time Warner Cable Partners with Telemundo to Launch New Hispanic Campaign Starring Carmen Villalobos of the Hit Super Series, El Señor de los Cielos
text:
» Rate Card [September 23, 2015] Time Warner Cable Partners with Telemundo to Launch New Hispanic Campaign Starring Carmen Villalobos of the Hit Super Series, El Señor de los Cielos 
Time Warner ( News - Alert ) Cable (TWC) has partnered with Telemundo to launch a new Disfruta Aún Más campaign to communicate how TWC continues to enhance its products and services to help customers connect to what they love at home and on-the-go with value-driven offerings like the Triple Play ( News - Alert ) bundle, Everyday Low Price Internet, TWC Phone Unlimited and the new Phone 2 Go App . The new Spanish-language campaign launches this week with four TV spots scheduled for the duration of the campaign, starring Colombian-born actress, Carmen Villalobos, of the hit Telemundo super series, El Señor de los Cielos. The commercials will air across the TWC footprint and will also be available for viewing on the TWC YouTube ( News - Alert ) page ( YouTube.com/twc ). 
TWC recently announced the expansion of TWC Phone Unlimited to include unlimited calling to all 28 countries in the European Union plus Norway. TWC customers with the phone plan can already make unlimited calls to anywhere in the U.S., Canada, Mexico, China, India, Hong Kong, Puerto Rico, Guam, and the U.S. Virgin Islands, and now can call most of Europe, all for one low monthly price. 
Time Warner Cable also launched the Phone 2 Go App , which allows customers to access their TWC Phone service on the go over a WiFi or cellular data connection with an Apple ( News - Alert ) iOS or Android mobile phone or tablet. 
As part of the new Disfruta Aún Más campaign with Telemundo, customers wil have a chance to meet and greet Carmen Villalobos at events in Los Angeles on September 26 th , 10:30a.m. - 12:00 p.m. at the TWC retail location in Plaza Mexico and in New York City on November 14 th , 11:30 a.m. - 1:00 p.m. at TWC's Flagship experience store located at 43 West 23 rd Street in Manhattan. 
Additionally, the campaign will include a national sweepstakes exclusively for TWC residential customers where participants can enter for a chance to win an all-expense paid trip to Mexico. Details will be released on or around November 4 th . 
Customers can log on to Facebook.com/MiCultura or follow TWC on Twitter ( News - Alert ) or @micultura for up-to-date information on Time Warner Cable programming, offers, promotions and other exciting benefits exclusive to customers. Information on all Time Warner Cable products, services and current promotions is also available in Spanish under the "Español" tab on www.twc.com . 
About Time Warner Cable 
Time Warner Cable Inc. (NYSE:TWC) is among the largest providers of video, high-speed data and voice services in the United States, connecting 15 million customers to entertainment, information and each other. Time Warner Cable Business Class offers data, video and voice services to businesses of all sizes, cell tower backhaul services to wireless carriers and managed and outsourced information technology solutions and cloud services. Time Warner Cable Media, the advertising arm of Time Warner Cable, offers national, regional and local companies innovative advertising solutions. More information about the services of Time Warner Cable is available at www.twc.com , www.twcbc.com and www.twcmedia.com .
